text:
Reminder: Sarah Wilson's follow-up appointment is scheduled for 02/24. Please confirm her attendance.

Sarah is a 35-year-old patient who was recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes and high blood pressure. At her last visit, she was prescribed metformin for her diabetes and lisinopril to manage her hypertension.

It's important that Sarah attends this follow-up appointment so we can monitor her progress and ensure her medication regimen is effective. Please let us know if she will be able to make it or if we need to reschedule.
